definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: zhi2 xian4 xing4 jia1 su4 qi4

sentences.english: Objective To research the LISREL and its application in the biomedical studies.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討線性結構模型理論及其在醫學中的應用。

sentences.english: Let's take a linear function of x, y, and z.
sentences.chinese: 我們來看關於x，y，z的一個線性方程。

sentences.english: The block decoupling problem for linear time-invariant systems is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論線性時不變系統的塊解耦問題。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic value of diaphragm activity range to foreign body transmitted X-rays in bronchus.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價橫膈動度對透X線性支氣管異物的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Each file contains linear PCM essence.
sentences.chinese: 每個文件都包含有線性PCM精髓。

sentences.english: HF radar backscatter from the ocean surface shows nonlinearities and time variation of its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 高頻波段海洋回波信號表現了非線性和頻譜時變性。

sentences.english: Total settlement of composite foundation still decreases with the length of column.
sentences.chinese: 但地基的總體沉降量仍然隨樁長增加而線性減小。

sentences.english: In chapter 1, a difference scheme of some two-dimensional linear pseudo-parabolic equation is concerned.
sentences.chinese: 第一章中討論了二維線性僞拋物型方程的差分格式。

sentences.english: It is point out that the fluctuation of structure function lead to nonlinear scaling law.
sentences.chinese: 指出結構函數的振盪漲落導致非線性標度律。

sentences.english: A method of deriving linear model of 3-dimention hydraulic shaking system was presented.
sentences.chinese: 導出了三軸液壓振動系統的線性化模型。

sentences.english: The linear rods are supported by engineered polymer plastic bushings.
sentences.chinese: 線性棒支持的聚合物塑料套管。

sentences.english: Optimality Conditions for a Class of Generalized Semi-infinite Programming;
sentences.chinese: 並給出了非線性半定規劃的最優性必要和充分條件。

sentences.english: Optimization controller for linear discrete-time state space model is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計出線性離散狀態空間的最優控制器。

sentences.english: A nonlinear steam valve controller is designed by using the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 應用該方法設計了發電機主汽門非線性魯棒控制器。

sentences.english: This phenomenon appears even more striking in the simulation realization of non-linear negative impedance.
sentences.chinese: 這在非線性負阻抗的模擬實現中，更爲突出。

sentences.english: We obtain an upper bounded estimate for the convergence rate of the piecewise linear interpolation.
sentences.chinese: 給出了分段線性插值收斂速度的一種估計。

definition: to pile up/to put layer upon layer/(Tw) (computing) stack
to flow and change/development and change (of society)
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
